mapper.insert: insert into wish_list(prod_code, user_id, in_date, in_user, up_date, up_user) values (#{prodCode}, #{userId}, current_time, current_user, current_time , current_user)
mapper.select: select count(*) from wish_list where prod_code = #{prodCode} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from wish_list where prod_code = #{prodCode} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select wish.up_date, wish.prod_code, wish.user_id, brand.name as bname, prod.name as pname, prc, min(dc_prc)as dc_prc, max(dc_rate) as dc_rate, gifti.dc_rate,gft_stus_code, prod.img_path from wish_list as wish INNER JOIN gifticon as gifti ON wish.prod_code = gifti.prod_code INNER JOIN product as prod ON gifti.prod_code = prod.code INNER JOIN brand ON prod.brd_code = brand.code where wish.user_id= #{userId} group by wish.prod_code order by wish.up_date desc
